name: Divine sword Irelia ˗ˏˋ ა ˎˊ˗ (LoRA)
description:
annyong (✿◠ᴗ◠)づ !!! I'm on a bit of a hiatus from making content here but someone requested Irelia andd umm I have an undying love for people who main her so here she is (ㅅ´ ˘ `) !!

Requested by @Cinders thank you so much for the request !! I really appreciate it ( ˘͈ ᵕ ˘͈♡)

((This Lora does work for photorealistic models sorta for once hehe))

This Lora works with almost every anime model and semi realistic models !! so go wild with it !! ^^

I recommend keeping the weight at (1-0.8) and using the negative prompts as needed !!

Please use negative prompt Embedding bad-image-v2-39000 it works a lot better then without it !!

Please use Trigger words ((naked)), (nude), nipples if your having issues with getting good NSFW generations (specifically with her breast not having nipples) <3

This time you can get all of her likeness through just a single trigger word listed above<3

I had so much fun making the Lora and generating the images I hope you have as much fun as I did ⸜(｡˃ ᵕ ˂ )⸝♡ !!! I actually had so much fun playing around with using random Lora's with this one ! I would highly recommend trying this Lora out with some others hehe !! <3

Please be kind with this Lora ♡

modelVersions.name: Divine_sword_Irelia_V1
modelVersions.description:
I highly recommend using the trigger word Divine_sword_Irelia.

I also highly recommend keeping the weight between (1-0.8) and using negative prompts where needed !

Here are all the settings used for most the examples:

Size: 512x512

Clip skip: 2

Hires upscale: 2

Hires upscaler: R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B

If you have any issues please tell me and ill try and help !! ૮₍ ˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶ ₎ა

meta.prompt:
(detailed grass field background), masterpiece, best quality, ((five fingers))
 <lora:Divine_sword_Irelia-05:0.8>
meta.negativePrompt: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad anatomy), extra digit, fewer digits, (extra arms:1.2), (bad-hands-5),  bad-picture-chill-75v, less then 5 fingers, (badhandv4)
